thread.title: Wes Gillis Joins VUE Software as Practice Leader of Health and Medicare

author: cnbc.com
title: Wes Gillis Joins VUE Software as Practice Leader of Health and Medicare
text:
COCONUT CREEK, Fla., March 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- VUE Software , Leading the Insurance Distribution-Modernization Movement, announced today Wes Gillis has joined their team as the new Practice Leader of Health and Medicare.
With a deep background in Health Insurance and Medicare Advantage, Mr. Gillis brings domain expertise in all facets of health insurance including compliance and incentive compensation for advisors and member representatives. Mr. Gillis is excited to leverage his deep insurance-industry connections and build a team of subject-matter experts to meet the needs of a rapidly evolving health insurance market.
Mr. Gillis comes to VUE Software from EvolveSPM, Los Angeles CA, where he served as Vice President of Product and Business Development for more than 5 years. Previously, Mr. Gillis was a systems engineer at DENSO: Navigation Laboratories. An innovative seasoned software veteran of more than 15 years, he has led successful implementations at dozens of carriers including Blue Cross Blue Shield plans.
Mr. Gillis is a graduate of the University of Nebraska Omaha where he earned a Master of Business Administration degree.
About VUE SoftwareÂ®
VUE Software is a single scalable platform built from the ground up for Insurers, MGAs, FMOs, IMOs, and Insurance Distributors who have outgrown their current tools and require greater automation for producer administration and sales processes. Founded by CSSI over two decades ago, VUE Software offers configurable solutions to meet the unique needs of the Life and Annuity, Health, and Property and Casualty markets. The company leads the Distribution-Modernization movement and provides insurance organizations a solid path to revenue growth and competitive advantage, supporting multiple product types, distribution channels, and hierarchy types.
